advice_templates.Robbery: 🚨 **Robbery Alert**: Avoid this area, especially at night. Travel in groups if possible. Contact local authorities immediately.
advice_templates.Flooding: 🌊 **Flooding Warning**: Road may be impassable. Avoid driving through flooded areas. Find alternative routes.
advice_templates.Protest: 🏛️ **Protest Notice**: Expect traffic delays and road closures. Plan alternative routes and allow extra travel time.
advice_templates.Road Damage: 🛣️ **Road Damage**: Potholes or road damage detected. Drive carefully and report to authorities.
advice_templates.Traffic: 🚗 **Traffic Alert**: Heavy traffic congestion. Consider alternative routes or delay travel if possible.
advice_templates.Other: ⚠️ **Road Incident**: Exercise caution in this area. Follow local traffic advisories and authorities.
